external_links.context: Some processed fruits or vegetables, such as frozen and canned products, are conditionally exempt from the nutrition symbol requirements [B.01.350(6), FDR].

external_links.text: Foods exempt from the front-of-package (FOP) nutrition symbol requirements
external_links.context: See Foods exempt from the front-of-package (FOP) nutrition symbol requirements for details on the exemptions and the loss of the exemption.
